law.catch_line: Brand to be exclusive trade-mark; infringement forbidden.

text.section: Every brand adopted under KRS 364.070 shall, from the date of its adoption, be the exclusive trade-mark of the person adopting it.
No person shall knowingly use or attempt to use any such brand without the written consent of the owner.

law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1409-8.
